Class SimpleMatch

java.lang.Object
tcore.Primitive
tcore.RulePrimitive
tcore.strategy.SimpleMatch
All Implemented Interfaces:
IMatchAlgo
public class SimpleMatch extends RulePrimitive implements IMatchAlgo
T-Core primitive meant for matching a LHS with a given Model.

      public ArrayList<Match> match()
      Tries to match the LHS to the Model. FIXME: 2017-12-08 The algorithm finds all the matches and filters out the submatches afterwards. Innefficient and costly.
